doc: Describes which edge of a widget a certain feature is positioned at, e.g. the tabs of a , the handle of a or the label of a .

members.doc: The feature is at the left edge.
members.name: left

members.doc: The feature is at the right edge.
members.name: right

members.doc: The feature is at the top edge.
members.name: top

members.doc: The feature is at the bottom edge.
members.name: bottom

name: PositionType
